work.description: Architectured and developed from scratch a cross-platform site (web, ios & tvos app) for Dolby, the largest American company specialized in audio noise reduction and audio encoding/compression.

myAudi is the key to the digital, networked world of Audi. This app is where the users will find innovative services that can now use even more efficiently thanks to myAudi. Within this portal a variety of activities can be done, such as schedule a service appointment, get personal vehicle details, receive a vehicle status report, be informed of news centred round Audi, change the setting for all the services or send personal GPS destinations to an Audi vehicle.

Dot Foods is the largest foodservice redistribution company in the United States. This company offers over 112,000 products from 830 food industry manufacturers. Dot consolidates those products and delivers in less-than-truckload quantities to distributors nationwide on a weekly basis. Distributors can buy a mix of temperatures and products, with a combined minimum of just 5,000 pounds.
This platform was created to facilitate the US consumers' purchase decision by helping them find, learn about, evaluate, pick, visualize and buy the appliance(s) matching their needs and profile.
